actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
Reported to House from the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries with amendment, H. Rept. 94-335.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #363 (400-0).
Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Commerce with an amendment, S. Rept 94-594.
House agreed to Senate amendment with amendments.

official_title: An Act to extend until the close of 1983 the period in which appropriations are authorized to be appropriated for the acquisition of wetlands, and to increase the maximum amount of such authorization, and for other purposes.

summary.as: House agreed to Senate amendment with amendment
summary.text: (House agreed to Senate amendments with amendments) Wetlands Loan Extension Act - Extends for a period of seven years (from June 30, 1976, to September 30, 1983) the authorization, under the Wetlands Loan Act, that allows appropriations to be made to the Migratory Bird Conservation Fund in the form of interest free loans for the purpose of acquiring wetlands for migratory waterfowl. Extends from fiscal year 1977 to fiscal year 1983 the date when monies appropriated to the Migratory Bird Conservation Fund would be required to be repaid to the Treasury of the United States from duck stamp receipts. Changes, under the Hunting Stamp Tax Act, the name of the "migratory bird hunting stamp" to the "migratory bird hunting and conservation stamp". Authorizes the sale of duck stamps at places other than post offices; and provides that anyone can redeem unused stamps under prescribed conditions. Requires the Department of the Interior, as well as the Postal Service, to deposit the revenues it has collected from duck stamp sales into the Migratory Bird Conservation Fund account. Allows the Secretary of the Interior to purchase or rent interests in land, water, or land and water, which have been recommended for purchase or rental by the Migratory Bird Conservation Commission. Revises, under the National Wildlife Refuge System Administration Act, the exchange authority of the Secretary of the Interior to allow him to dispose of interests in acquired or public lands within the System by land exchange.

titles.title: A bill to extend until the close of 1983 the period in which appropriations are authorized to be appropriated for the acquisition of wetlands, and to increase the maximum amount of such authorization.

An Act to extend until the close of 1983 the period in which appropriations are authorized to be appropriated for the acquisition of wetlands, and to increase the maximum amount of such authorization, and for other purposes.
